gotmeolk 158700761817 "2017-03-22 12:09:58 GMT" http://gotmeolk.tumblr.com/post/158700761817/ok-so "I was watching this series on Netflix. “Click My Heart”And that dude right there in the pink column immediately got my attention.I literally say “wtf he’s so cute what is this” every time the dude appears on screen.Seriously. Look at how cute.So. CUTE.So I googled the cast.And… idiot that I am
column2: I had no idea that their names in the series were their actual names in real life. And that “dude” is actually SF9′s Lee Dawon. C U T E . So…I googled a bit more.And I thought to myself… “He kinda reminds me of someone I love…”And surely enough…these pop out of google search…Istg everything I do just keeps tracing back to Park Jimin. o.o" True text
